name: INTELLISOFT Corp
tagline: we turn great ideas into outstanding products
description:
Intellisoft turns great ideas into outstanding products. If you are looking for a company with excellent track record and great communication skills - we can help you. We deliver full-cycle Agile product development, from scoping through production to deployment and support.
Our team of 30+ engineers, designers, UI/UX specialists, quality assurance engineers, product and project managers holds a wide range of expertise in:
Mobile (iOS and Android) apps
Front-End (AngularJS, React and Backbone.js)
MEAN/MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, Angular/React, and Node.js)
LAMP/LEMP (Linix, Apache/NGINX, PHP, MySQL)
eCommerce (Magento)Â 
.NET
Mobile apps, SaaS Projects, RIA (rich internet applications) and high load (20M+ users/daily) projects is our specialization.
